title: MAG 145 - Infectious Doubts Transcripts
text:
st up a bit, take it easy. 
GEORGIE 
Really? Cos I’m pretty sure I heard you talking about a screaming headless 
corpse just now. 
ARCHIVIST 
Oh, were you listen— 
GEORGIE 
Oh, um, didn’t mean to. You know, these doors are not that thick. 
ARCHIVIST 
Fine. I’m deep in it. Had some close calls. 

The Magnus Archives – 145 – Infectious Doubts 
 
20 
 
GEORGIE 
I’m sorry to hear that. You should probably get some therapy too. 
ARCHIVIST 
Would you go with me as well? 
GEORGIE 
No. 
ARCHIVIST 
Yeah, I thought as much. 
GEORGIE 
The other office, you say? 
ARCHIVIST 
Yeah. 
GEORGIE 
Yeah, thanks. Take care of yourself. 
ARCHIVIST 
(Sighs) You too. 
[Door closes] 
ARCHIVIST (Cont.) 
End recording 

The Magnus Archives – 145 – Infectious Doubts 
 
21 
 
[Tape clicks off.]

Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims and directed by Alexander J 
Newall. 
It featured: Jonathan Sims as the Archivist, Sue Sims as Gertrude Robinson, 
John-Henry Falle as Arthur Nolan, and Sasha Sienna as Georgie Barker.
